Option.Name: HostPlatformOnly
Option.Description: A helper option to make an installed build for your host platform only, so that you don't have to disable each platform individually

Option.Name: AllPlatforms
Option.Description: Include all target platforms by default

Option.Name: WithDDC
Option.Description: Build a standalone derived-data cache for the engine content and templates

Option.Name: HostPlatformDDCOnly
Option.Description: Whether to include DDC for the host platform only

Option.Name: SignExecutables
Option.Description: Sign the executables produced where signing is available

Option.Name: AnalyticsTypeOverride
Option.Description: Identifier for analytic events to send

Option.Name: EmbedSrcSrvInfo
Option.Description: Whether to add Source indexing to Windows game apps so they can be added to a symbol server

Option.Name: GameConfigurations
Option.Description: Which game configurations to include for packaged applications

Option.Name: WithFullDebugInfo
Option.Description: Generate full debug info for binary editor and packaged application builds

Option.Name: ForceVS2015
Option.Description: Whether to force use of the VS2015 compiler for Windows targets. Object files built against the VS2015 CRT are compatible with VS2017 CRT, but not vice versa.

Error.Message: $(HostPlatform) is not supported for making an installed build
